mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAL_SCH VALUES(SEQ_SCH_NO.NEXTVAL, MEM_NUM=#{memNum}, CAL_NO = #{calNo}, SCH_NAME=#{schName}, CAL_NAME=#{calName}, SCH_START_DATE=#{schStartDate}, SCH_START_HOUR=#{schStartHour}, SCH_START_MIN=#{schStartMin}, SCH_END_DATE=#{schEndDate}, SCH_END_HOUR=#{schEndHour},SCH_END_MIN=#{schEndMin}, SCH_CONTENT=#{schContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
